DOC.brief_title: Physiologic Interactions Between Adrenal- Parathyroid Glands
DOC.detailed_description: In primary hyperparathyroidism , chronic-elevated PTH level seem stimulate renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system ( RAAS ) may explain increased risk cardiovascular disease . In addition increase PTH level , vitamin D show inhibit RAAS . However , possible physiologic interaction need investigation . The purpose study investigate change RAAS otherwise healthy postmenopausal woman secondary hyperparathyroidism due vitamin D deficiency p-PTH normalized . Furthermore , evaluate whether angiotensin 2 receptor blocker lower PTH patient secondary hyperparathyroidism .
